_sText:
cs_hurst_GOLD


Overview
Terrorists have taken over an abandond peninsula fort on the southern coast of Britain. They have taken the local lighthouse crew hostage as guarentee of their safety.
The peninsula is positoned such that the tangos will soon be able to threaten local sipping roots.

The counter-terrorists must rescue the hostages and put an end to the Terrorist threat.

Designed by:	 Paul (Hickster) James
E-Mail: 	 hickster@hotpop.com

Bugs, annoyances and general info contact the e-mail above


******* To Install ********

Run .zip and extract to:
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\email@email.com\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

***************************

Enjoy!
